entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.5.5
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.5.4...v2.5.5

added the official paperless-ai Icon

Fixed a bug with settings not correctly submitting a field value.

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.5.6
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.5.5...v2.5.6

a18ccb12e2cd9f829a10bf273ac570d5ee49a912 Fix settings route to correctly save the automatic disable function

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI:
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.5.6...v2.6.0

Added Token Usage Distribution, Document Type Distribution and Task Runner Status to the Dashboard. https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/commit/c4193aa6e27b3cfe280d35627cae8c0e3f34e842

https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/275

Fixed https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/310

Added feature: https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/276

increase axios timeout to 30min https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/282

Added CONTENT_MAX_LENGTH recognition for the .env file. https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/284

fixed corrupt and remnant code https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/310

fixed datatable sorting https://github.com/https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/265

Fix settings route to correctly save the automatic disable function https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/commit/a18ccb12e2cd9f829a10bf273ac570d5ee49a912
